definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: gaze (NH id., Sir 40:29, Sir 50:5; late Rabb. [[הַשְׁגׇּחָה]] = providence (from Ps 33:14; JAram. [[שְׁגַח]] gaze, consider);—c. [[אֶל־]] pers.; Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׁגִּיחַ]] Ps 33:14 (of ´[[י]]:; [[מִן]] loc.); Impf. 3 mpl. [[רׂאֶיךָ אֵלֶיךָ יַשְׁגִּיחוּ]] Is 14:16 they that see thee, at thee shall they gaze (‖[[אֵלָיךָ יִתְבּוֹנׇ֫נוּ ]]; cf. [[משגיח על שלחן]] Sir 40:29); abs.: Pt. [[מַשְׁגִּיחַ]] Ct So 2:9 (c. [[מִן]] from (the outside of) the windows).
